Query: How to adjust the screen resolution in Debian?

Answers.MP Summary: adjust backlight brightness using RandR extension
Top-3 Similar Questions: au_1060147: How can I adjust the screen brightness in i3wm on Ubuntu 16.04?
Top-3 Scripts:
au_1060147: bindsym XF86MonBrightnessUp exec xbacklight -inc 10
bindsym XF86MonBrightnessDown exec xbacklight -dec 10

Explanations about Options.-inc: Increases brightness by the specified amount.
Explanations about Options.-dec: Decreases brightness by the specified amount.

Answers.MP Summary: set color temperature of display according to time of day
Top-3 Similar Questions: ul_17859: How can I simply adjust monitor color temperture in X?

Explanations about Options.-t:
DAY:NIGHT
 Color temperature to set at daytime/night.
Explanations about Options.-o:
One-shot mode (do not continuously adjust color temperature). Use this with the -P
 option to clear the existing gamma ramps before applying the new color temperature.
Explanations about Options.-m:
METHOD[:OPTIONS]
 Method to use to set color temperature (Use "-m list" to see available methods).
Explanations about Options.-l:
PROVIDER[:OPTIONS]
 Select provider for automatic location updates (Use "-l list" to see available
 providers).
